text: According to People , Jolie has hired Judy Smith, the real woman that Pope's character was based on, to consult as she goes through her divorce. Smith acts as a co-executive producer on Scandal and, according to her website, "provides insight and technical expertise on crisis management issues." She has advised a number of high-profile clients during her decades-long career, including Monica Lewinsky and Wesley Snipes. She also worked with Sony after it was hacked in 2014.
